data.title: Supernova | The Design System Platform That Grows With You
data.description: Connect design and engineering data in a single design system tool. Supernova adapts to your company's needs and enables your teams to accelerate and scale product development.
data.content:
Supernova | The Design System Platform That Grows With You
===============
          

[](https://www.supernova.io/)

Features  

[Documentation](https://www.supernova.io/documentation)[Design system management](https://www.supernova.io/design-system-management)[Code automation](https://www.supernova.io/code-automation)[Forge](https://www.supernova.io/forge)[Design tokens](https://www.supernova.io/design-tokens)[Integrations](https://www.supernova.io/integrations)

Solutions

[Enterprise](https://www.supernova.io/enterprise)[DesignOps](https://www.supernova.io/designops)[Adoption](https://www.supernova.io/adoption)

[Pricing](https://www.supernova.io/pricing)[Customers](https://www.supernova.io/customers)

Resources

[Blog](https://www.supernova.io/blog)[Events](https://www.supernova.io/events)[Learn Supernova](https://learn.supernova.io/latest/introduction/welcome-to-supernova.html)[Build Your Business Case](https://www.supernova.io/roi)[Design System Mapping Tool](https://www.supernova.io/design-system-mapping-tool)[Reports & Resources](https://www.supernova.io/reports)

[What's new](https://learn.supernova.io/latest/releases/latest-releases-EhxYhfBn)

[Login](https://app.supernova.io/?_gl=1*13xcr94*_ga*MjEyNTM4NDc4OC4xNzA4MDk0NTc4*_ga_MQWTX6KRP3*MTcwOTA0NzU3MC4xNi4wLjE3MDkwNDc1NzAuNjAuMC4w)

[Sign up](https://app.supernova.io/signup?_gl=1*13xcr94*_ga*MjEyNTM4NDc4OC4xNzA4MDk0NTc4*_ga_MQWTX6KRP3*MTcwOTA0NzU3MC4xNi4wLjE3MDkwNDc1NzAuNjAuMC4w)

[Is your Design-to-Code workflow drama-free? – Play Bingo to find out Play Design-to-Code Bingo](https://www.supernova.io/bingo)

Build better products, faster
=============================

Supernova connects your design and engineering data in a single design system tool to accelerate and scale your product development.

[Get started](https://app.supernova.io/signup?_gl=1*13xcr94*_ga*MjEyNTM4NDc4OC4xNzA4MDk0NTc4*_ga_MQWTX6KRP3*MTcwOTA0NzU3MC4xNi4wLjE3MDkwNDc1NzAuNjAuMC4w)

[Request a demo](https://www.supernova.io/request-a-demo)

 Your browser does not support the video tag.

![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/635ba7ad088a3797c8b35928_dots%20(1).png)

Supernova is the trusted partner to help companies around the world scale their design systems

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cce404d2fa8063212bf6e0_abinbev.svg)

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cd05dae8fd18d558ce8300_biogen.svg)

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65f2cd944475cceceb9a421c_Logo_of_the_Carrier_Corporation%201.svg)

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cce3bef013cf53b5c6d7e8_essity.svg)

![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cd05b7f550bb63071bb71d_hexagon.svg)

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cce3cde5b44f0f8713d77c_kraft-heinz.svg)

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cce3dde59e2638167121eb_paramount.svg)

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cd06a1e0ed7dad32165572_vmware.svg)

The design system platform that grows with you
----------------------------------------------

[Designed for flexibility Tailor Supernova to build a design system that meets your specifications without the cost of bespoke technologies.](https://www.supernova.io/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)[Connected ecosystem Communicate more effectively. Supernova plugs into your existing tooling ecosystem so your team can find everything they need, when they need it.](https://www.supernova.io/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)[Save time & resources Stop manual updates. Supernova automatically detects design changes in Figma and updates your documentation and code.](https://www.supernova.io/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65d0de30960ab49fbb1cc449_Documentation-2.png)

![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65f87abb0a34df76ebc8ee18_tab-1.png)

![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65d39d36fbe47be6eccc3f87_autoupdate-1.png)

[Get started with Supernova](https://app.supernova.io/signup?_gl=1*13xcr94*_ga*MjEyNTM4NDc4OC4xNzA4MDk0NTc4*_ga_MQWTX6KRP3*MTcwOTA0NzU3MC4xNi4wLjE3MDkwNDc1NzAuNjAuMC4w)

[Request a demo](https://www.supernova.io/request-a-demo)

![Image 13: Mindstone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65d65b08e647684b8468a349_mindstone.svg)

This is the tool to use to help push your engineering and design teams togethers. As far as I'm aware, fully automating design changes in figma all the way to deployment is cutting edge and either done through a fully custom build pipeline or via Supernova.

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/655c82c3ca4f4df7d37e0436_stefan-mindstone.jpeg)

##### Stefan Keranov

Co-Founder & Engineering

![Image 15: Phoenix Group](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cd0625b5e4bb5b2d59cefd_phoenix.svg)

If you love Figma's approach to fast, iterative development you will love Supernova.

Their team is engaging in feedback, their discord channel, and even asking to rate future features. Aside from that, the product is easy to set up and use.

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/655c85c7f95083933a087808_andrew-phoenix.jpeg)

##### Andrew Cetnarskyj

Design Systems Designer

![Image 17: Move.com](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/63340e9d9bf594763bc9b988_move.svg)

We put a few design system documentation products through a feature review versus our own hand-rolled option, and found Supernova to be the most valuable for our design system needs.

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/6336bdda822f04bbf5752a1d_move-photo.png)

##### Bethany Shwanke

Principal Designer, ex-IBM Carbon

![Image 19: The Fork](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65e83a6f3f0bf193e15642be_Group%20(1).svg)

Supernova is our source of truth for managing and documenting our Design System at TheFork, and I have to admit that version 2.0 is a real game changer.

The live collaboration, new ergonomics, and responsiveness of the team make it a tool I can't recommend highly enough.

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65e838039dcc3f2f7d2c03be_Thomas%20Lautre%CC%81dou.jpeg)

##### Thomas Lautrédou

Senior System Designer

![Image 21: BTG Pactual](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/635c041180fbbd8e9d9ad23b_btg.svg)

Supernova is a more modern and complete platform than what we’ve previously used. All the support we’ve received since our arrival shows just how much better it is to be here. Thanks to the Supernova team.

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/6360dcb70d267a31f6d13577_renato-michalischen.webp)

##### Renato Michalischen

Design Ops Lead

![Image 23: Huspy.io](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/6336bd65a1320381fdf4369b_huspy.svg)

Supernova is enabling the Huspy team to grow with a source of truth that can easily be updated by multiple collaborators.

Engagement with the documentation has been a true indicator of how useful this tool is for us.

![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/6336bd91f798ee17b8d3b198_huspy-photo.png)

##### Eduardo Sousa Tello

Senior Product Designer

![Image 25: Celonis](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/65cd06b12ee8ffd2bd4e458a_celonis.svg)

Supernova is a tool that really understands the needs of design systems creators. We’ve had no fun in the past working with other tools’ documentation, but that’s all changed now. It’s easy to use, intuitive, and offers many opportunities to scale in the future.

As a single source of truth, it is mind-blowing, efficient, fast, and highly customizable. They also listen to their customers and prioritize their roadmaps to fit their needs which is a great bonus.

![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/635b9ab541909d8f101ee4c6_celonis2.jpeg)

##### Matthias Fritsch

Design Lead

![Image 27: Productboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/63340eab61575d0202bcb8fa_productboard.svg)

Supernova has massively helped allow the wider org to understand the value of our design system and its importance to the org.

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63340e4175515b8b5cefdbd4/655c85f28c4ebd19df77e5ef_john-atkins.jpeg)

##### John Atkins

Design System Lead

Slide 4 of 8.

![Image 29](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c6af2fa7c492cc187bca_Ellipse%2051%20(1).png)![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c8161231caf42d905ded_Ellipse%2052%20(1).png)![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c99399582cd4b0ae1600_Ellipse%2060%20(1).png)![Image 32](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c8161231caf42d905ded_Ellipse%2052%20(1).png)![Image 33](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c88b0489cca094b88c3c_Ellipse%2059%20(1).png)![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c9c5c226766af3a46830_Ellipse%2061%20(1).png)![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0c86127d32908b057d3c4_Ellipse%2053%20(1).png)

![Image 36](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bce84412ed4115ba8ec187_collaboration-icon.png)

### Enterprise ready

Collaborate at scale. Enable your entire organization to effectively design, build, and scale product development.

[Explore](https://www.supernova.io/enterprise)

![Image 37](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65ef842db3d3bb72ddf85921_avatar-3.jpg)

![Image 38](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65ef842d321e728d0a3584be_avatar-1.jpg)

![Image 39](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65ef842d336df1a8a092ca97_avatar-2.jpg)

![Image 40](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bce88c22f3f674d4cd1f0f_database-icon.png)

### Your data, your solutions

Extend beyond a platform. Leverage Supernova’s SDK and CLI to access and develop custom solutions with your design system data.

[Learn more](https://www.supernova.io/code-automation)

![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bcead11e58e6ad94639411_rocket-up-icon.png)

### Integrate key workflows

Use your favorite apps. Supernova seamlessly plugs into your existing design and development tools to create a connected ecosystem.

[Explore integrations](https://www.supernova.io/integrations)

![Image 42: Image showing Supernova's connection to various integrations that help support your design system tool workflow.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bceb1fc8c163ba927e06ce_integrations-supernova-central.png)

![Image 43](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bce8fc9097eab61164e399_rocket-icon.png)

### Powerful content blocks

Start documenting usage guidelines, design tokens, and component patterns immediately — no coding experience needed.

[Explore documentation](https://www.supernova.io/documentation)

![Image 44: An image showing the different ways you can display design tokens and other design system data in your design system documentation in Supernova.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/637394708189077a06e9e45d_Document-Tokens.webp)

![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bce9b8b800ba8b1493e42a_repeat-icon.png)

### Continuous design updates

Link your Figma library once. Supernova regularly syncs your files, so you never have to copy and paste designs again.

[Connect Figma](https://www.supernova.io/design-system-management)

![Image 46](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/635fe6ca2751f1a0fe5b140f_Code.svg)

### Automate for efficiency

Reduce errors with automated workflows. Implement design-to-code pipelines tailored to your tech stack.

[Automate your workflow](https://www.supernova.io/code-automation)

Radius Small

Radius Medium

Radius Large

Radius Full

\[  
  {  
    “name”: “Radius Small”,  
    “value”: “8px”,  
  }  
  {  
    “name”: “Radius Medium”,  
    “value”: “16px”,  
  }  
  {  
    “name”: “Radius Large”,  
    “value”: “24px”,  
  }  
  {  
    “name”: “Radius Full”,  
    “value”: “50%”,  
  }  
\]

measures.css

:root {  
  \--borderRadiusSmall: 8px;  
  \--borderRadiusMedium: 16px;  
  \--borderRadiusLarge: 24px;  
  \--borderRadiusFull: 50%;  
}

measures.ts

const borderRadiusRadiusSmall = {  
  measure: 8,  
  unit: "Pixels",  
  css: "8px",  
};  
const borderRadiusRadiusMedium = {  
  measure: 16,  
  unit: "Pixels",  
  css: "8px",  
};  
const borderRadiusRadiusLarge = {  
  measure: 24,  
  unit: "Pixels",  
  css: "8px",  
};  
const borderRadiusRadiusFull = {  
  measure: 50,  
  unit: "Percent",  
  css: "50%",  
};  
  
export const Measures = {  
  borderRadiusRadiusSmall,  
  borderRadiusRadiusMedium,  
  borderRadiusRadiusLarge,  
  borderRadiusRadiusFull,  
}

AppMeasures.swift

import SwiftUI  
public struct AppMeasures {  
  public static let borderRadiusRadiusSmall = 8  
  public static let borderRadiusRadiusMedium = 16  
  public static let borderRadiusRadiusLarge = 24  
  public static let borderRadiusRadiusFull = 50  
}

dimens.xml

<resources\>  
  <dimen name="border\_radius\_radius\_small"\>8dp</dimen\>  
  <dimen name="border\_radius\_radius\_medium"\>16dp</dimen\>  
  <dimen name="border\_radius\_radius\_large"\>24dp</dimen\>  
  <dimen name="border\_radius\_radius\_full"\>50dp</dimen\>  
</resources\>  

No limitations

Export to any  
framework you need

![Image 47](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bceaa24c770d063d724200_lock-icon.png)

### Secure your data

Keep your data safe with Supernova. Our platform is SOC2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, SSO enabled, and more.

[Learn more](https://www.supernova.io/enterprise)

![Image 48: An image shocasing Supernova's robust security features.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65bceab60fe455d947c6d652_enterprise-features-supernova.png)

![Image 49](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0caee8967543981881852_dots.png)![Image 50](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0ca6809a951ab0c522541_dots-1.png)![Image 51](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0caee5c15d589b33efc44_dots-3.png)![Image 52](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0caee6cea1861e08b9bd0_dots-5.png)![Image 53](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/65c0caee5c15d589b33efc44_dots-3.png)

Get started with Supernova today
--------------------------------

Unlock the full potential of your design system with Supernova, empowering you to drive innovation, collaboration, and seamless scalability.

[Sign up for free](https://app.supernova.io/signup?_gl=1*13xcr94*_ga*MjEyNTM4NDc4OC4xNzA4MDk0NTc4*_ga_MQWTX6KRP3*MTcwOTA0NzU3MC4xNi4wLjE3MDkwNDc1NzAuNjAuMC4w)

[Request a demo](https://www.supernova.io/request-a-demo)

![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/632c2ca7090891667181cf26/633535d02918e2fb1bb2aa50_cta-blur.webp)

Supernova Cookie Consent
------------------------

By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. [Supernova Cookie Policy](https://www.supernova.io/privacy-policy)

Accept All Cookies

![Image 57: Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/f776f3fb-c0f2-41c0-84d2-3c1c7a39fc27/49516e57-acb3-45fd-8371-a823edb11d45/68250cda-7663-4cc9-a11e-9ece2fe73473/Supernova_Logo.png)

Supernova Privacy Preference Centre
-----------------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[Supernova Cookie Policy](https://www.supernova.io/privacy-policy)

User ID: ccf06544-d496-41d8-9a15-6113036b0bcf

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
